name: Who are You? (itch) (FannyYuan110)
description:
一个探讨机器人与人类关系的剧情向解谜游戏。

游戏中有不同的剧情分支，玩家可以通过选择不同的对话选项来解锁不同的结局。

在体验剧情的同时，游戏还具有一些解谜元素，玩家可以在游戏的过程中逐步收集线索，以揭开人物的真实身份。

目前第二关的测试版本可供下载。

A plot-oriented puzzle game that explores the relationship between human and robot.

There are different plot branches in this game, and you can unlock different endings by choosing different dialogue options.

While experiencing the plot, the game also has some puzzle-solving elements.You need to reveal the true identity of the characters gradually while you play.

You can download chapter2 demo now.
